name: Spellz
description:
SPELLZ, the magic game :
Become a magician, arm yourself with your favorite spells and fight.
Stay motivated and discover all the Spellz universes and their secrets. A true Hero never gives up.

SOCIAL NETWORKS :

COMMENTS :
Please, comment our video game and tell us what we need to change!
Unity is strenght!
